bibl.title: The Early Coptic Papacy. The Egyptian Church and Its Leadership in Late Antiquity. (The Popes of Egypt. 1.)
bibl.publisher: The American University in Cairo Press
bibl.note: 1. The Succession of St. Mark. - 2. Bishops, Teachers, and Martyrs. - 3. Theological Controversy and the Cultivation of Monastic Support. - 4. Contesting the Alexandrian Papacy. - Epilogue: The Making of the Coptic Papacy. - Appendices. Bibliography. Notes. Sources of Illustrations. Index.
